Package it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapon.expression

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    All
    Expression for returning all targets standing in a given range
    AllInRoom
    Return all targets standing in a given room (color)
    Behaviour
    Modified expression that encapsulates access to a hash map of subexpressions
    CanSee
    Behaviour for returning all targets that a given observer can see NB. the observer is considered the shooter if not specified
    Chain
    Expression for chaining two expression ranges
    ColorLiteral
    A terminal expression containing a color value
    DamageLiteral
    A terminal expression containing a damage literal
    Difference
    Behaviour that evaluates to the difference of two sets passed as subexpressions
    DirectionLiteral
    Literal containing a direction
    Distance
    Behaviour that evaluates to a range at a specified distance from a specified origin
    DistanceRange
    Behaviour that evaluates to a range visible as a ring around a given origin.
    Do
    Expression that executes all its subexpressions in order, discarding the results
    Done
    Expression symbolizing that an evaluation has been done.
    Expression
    Base class of the game subsystem used to describe weapon behaviours.
    ExpressionTest  
    GetColors
    Behaviour for retrieving the colors of the tiles from a given range
    GetVisibleRange
    Behaviour that evaluates to the range visible by an hypothetical observer standing on at a specified position (store in the origin subexpression)
    InflictDamage
    Behaviour that evaluates to nothing and inflicts damage to all specified players.
    InfLiteral
    Literal representing infinity
    Intersect
    Behaviour that evaluates to the intersection of two generic SetExpressions provided as its subexpressions
    IntLiteral
    Literal representing an integral value
    LastSelected
    Behaviour evaluating to the TargetLiteral that was last selected by a SelectTargets behaviour
    Line
    Behaviour evaluating to a range shaped like a line segment starting at a specified origin and ending after a specified length going in a specified direction.
    Literal<T>
    Expression representing a literal.
    Load
    Behaviour that complements the Store behaviour: it accepts a StringLiteral subexpressions and evaluates to the value that was previously associated with that StringLiteral by a previous evaluation of a Store behaviour
    Move
    Behaviour that evaluates to nothing and moves the specified targets in the specified position
    NegateTargets
    Behaviour that negates the selection of a given set of targets
    Neighbours
    Behaviour that evaluates to a set containing the players standing in the same tile of who
    Others
    Behaviour that evaluates to the remaining not previously selected targets.
    PickEffect
    Expression that evaluates to an effect picked by the user.
    Pos
    Expression that evaluates to the position of the specified (through subexpression) player.
    PositionLiteral
    Literal containing a Position value
    SelectOneColor
    Behaviour that takes a color from layer input
    SelectOneDirection
    Behaviour that takes a direction from player input
    SelectOnePosition
    Behaviour that takes a position from player input
    SelectOneTarget
    Behaviour that takes a one target from player input
    SelectTargets
    Behaviour that takes a set of targets from player input
    SetExpression
    Expression representing a set of expressions
    Store
    Stores the result of its subexpression into the given scope.
    StringLiteral
    Literal containing a string value
    TargetLiteral
    A literal containing a target
    UndoInfo
    Class recording information to undo a game state
    UndoInfo.PlayerUndoInfo  
    Union
    A behaviour evaluating to the union
    XorEffect
    Expression representing the selection of one between two weapon modes
    You
    Behaviour that evaluates to the current shooter
    YourPosition
    Behaviour that evaluates to your position
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsupportedConversionException
    Exception launched when an unsupported conversion is attempted
